website_summaries.verdict: The Acer S277HK is a smart-looking 27-inch Ultra-High-Definition (UHD) monitor that delivers a crisp 4K picture and solid color and gray-scale performance.

customer_reviews.title: Picture is nice but I do have to powercycle it every time ...
customer_reviews.text: Picture is nice but I do have to powercycle it every time the computer tells the monitor it should shut off. I changed the power settings to never dim the display and turn the monitor off to get around it though. I still have to power cycle it every couple of days or it just doesn't accept the signal. I cannot turn my computer off or I have to powercycle the monitor. If my computer bluescreens (happens frequently now when the computer is on for 10 days or so since this weird power issue) I again have to powercycle the monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 4K IPS Monitor - Nice Looking Display
customer_reviews.text: Previously had a TN 4K monitor. Was waiting on a 4K IPS monitor. The Acer S277HK fit the bill. As expected, color reproduction is much better than the TN display and of course viewing angles are superior. Nice looking with all metal stand. Easy angle adjustment, but no height adjustment. I knew that going in. Excellent Picture. Another advantage is HDMI 2.0. I plan on using the HDMI 2.0 port when the 390x becomes available. Response time is 4ms when set to extreme mode, which is excellent for an IPS monitor. No pixel issues at all. Perfect Pixel Display for me. :)
customer_reviews.author: Cool Mike

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful screen. No complains about color quality/resolution
customer_reviews.text: Pro: Beautiful screen. No complains about color quality/resolution. No visible dead pixels as of yet. Neutral: * Comparable to the Dell Ultra HD 4K P2415Q. * No bracket mount, so the provided stand. Fortunately, the stand is attractive and sturdy machined aluminum Con: * 5-buttons on bottom of screen aren't labeled. Because the sound (+/-) are next to menu buttons, it's very easy to accidentally reset the menu.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible monitors and the price keeps dropping!

You will not be disappointed with these. I noticed no light bleed, no dead pixels, just crystal clear 4K images.

customer_reviews.title: Began to fail 3 months after warranty expired
customer_reviews.text: The monitor itself is a beautiful monitor, stylish, modern looking, and has decent inputs. Not HDR capable, but that would have been much more expensive when this monitor was purchased. Worked very well for 3 years, and then one day, it started to display flickering horizontal black lines, and the brightness would decrease. Would randomly do this, and then return to normal. Conveniently, this all started about 3 months after the warranty expired. I have a case in with Acer, and hope they will offer a repair at a decent price. I will update the review if they do.

product_meta.title: Acer S277HK wmidpp 27-inch 4K Ultra HD (3840 x 2160) Widescreen Display
product_meta.description:
The stunning Acer S7 display is the world's first 4K Ultra-HD monitor equipped with HDMI 2.0, engineered to deliver both premium design and performance. Its 27-inch Zero Frame 4k Ultra-HD screen with superior color creates a borderless and crystal-clear world with detailed imagery while super-fast HDMI 2.0 connection and speakers with DTS sound round out your entertainment.

AMAZON.COM
The stunning Acer S7 display is the world’s first 4K Ultra-HD monitor equipped with HDMI 2.0, engineered to deliver both premium design and performance. Its 27-inch Zero Frame 4k Ultra-HD screen with superior color creates a borderless and crystal-clear world with detailed imagery while super-fast HDMI 2.0 connection and speakers with DTS sound round out your entertainment.




KEY FEATURES
 * Viewable Area: 27” 
 * Panel Type: IPS
 * Resolution: 3840 x 2160 (native and maximum)
 * Aspect Ratio: 16:9 
 * Contrast Ratio: 100 Million:1 MAX (ACM)
 * Brightness: 300 cd/m2
 * Response Time: 4ms
 * Refresh Rate: 60Hz
 * Signal Inputs: 1 x HDMI 2.0, 1 x Display Port, 1 x DVI (w/HDCP) & 1 x Mini Display Port
 * Speakers: 2 speakers, 2 watts per speaker
 * Weight: 11.9lbs.



LEARN MORE
 STUNNING 4K ULTRA-HD VISUALS 



Introducing the Acer S7 Series monitor, the world’s first 4K Ultra HD monitor equipped with HDMI 2.0. The sharp 4k Ultra HD display is 16:9 in 3840 X 2160 extremely high resolution which is four times higher than Full HD displays. The result is a premium visual experience with stunning, lifelike images with an amazing level of detail — making games more exciting and movies truly cinematic. 

Built-in 100% sRGB color correction technology delivers accurate and consistent color thats essential to design professionals and visual enthusiasts while IPS Technology, supporting 178 wide viewing angles, presents everything crisp and clear from any angle.

The rapid 4ms response time delivers high-quality, moving images while Super Sharpness technology lets you fix details from lower resolution and and adjust the image quality to always ensure you are viewing it at its best. 

For users who need to view their monitors for extended periods, the S7 monitor was equipped with Acer EyeProtect technology that reduces eye strain and provides a comfortable viewing experience. Flicker-less technology helps to eliminate screen flicker and a Blue Light Filter reduces exposure to blue light that can potentially cause long-term eye damage. The S7 also offers Low Dimming, which allows users to adjust down to 15 percent brightness in low light environments, and ComfyView technology to lessen reflections from external light sources. 


POWERFUL SOUND



Acer TrueHarmony presents a harmony of sound with enhanced bass, less distortion and dimensional sound. Its customized equalizer fine-tuning optimizes frequency balance ensuring movies come to life, songs have more depth, and games are even more engaging. Premium rear speaker with DTS sound effect fufills entertainment needs and creates a remarkable sonic flow. 

HDMI 2.0 connectivity increases bandwidth up to 18Gbps to transfer 4K content at 60 fps or four times the clarity of 1080p at 60 fps, for ever more powerful audio and visuals. A host of additional ports including DVI and Display Port, let you connect other devices, like your notebook or smartphone, to expand your perspective to a bigger screen. 

Safe for you and the environment, S7 Series monitors are RoHS compliant, use mercury-free white LED backlighting and meet ENERGY STAR requirements. Acer EcoDisplay technologies deliver up to 68% power savings, further conserving energy and costs. 


 FRAMELESS ELEGANT DESIGN 



A zero-frame design maximizes the viewing area and allows the screen to tilt back from 5°—15° for maximum comfort. When placed side by side, two Acer S7 monitors present an ideal multi-monitor setup, offering a nearly seamless viewing experience with their frameless screens. 

The Acer S7 display was designed with beauty in mind. The elegant highly glossed white finish complements any home decor while the sleek hair-line aluminum front bezel with silver matt-painting middle frame are as sophisticated as the quality of the sharp 4k Ultra HD display presents. 

A slim magnalium stand ensures the display is stable and properly supported while its asymmetryical design makes it stand out and keeps the stand stable and balanced while offering some extra space to rest your phone or pen. 

The semi-circle power button allows the users to interact more intuitively, and brightness buttons, OSD menu, and exit are perfect line up and invisible on the bottom of screen for keeping the clean image. The I/O accessions are well-organized on the rear side, and look consistency.
